thread.title: Barcelona cops ‘shoot at and arrest truck driver in vehicle packed with gas cylinders speeding towards city centre’
thread.title_full: Barcelona cops ‘shoot at and arrest truck driver in vehicle packed with gas cylinders speeding towards city centre’

author: elake
title: Barcelona cops ‘shoot at and arrest truck driver in vehicle packed with gas cylinders speeding towards city centre’
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments BARCELONA cops have shot at the driver of a truck reportedly packed with gas cylinders and speeding towards a city centre. 
The butane carrying truck reportedly rammed several cars as it sped towards the city. 
— Arrieros Somos (@arrierossomosgu) February 21, 2017 Detenido a tiros un camión de butano que ha embestido varios coches en Barcelona https://t.co/JfMrhzSmFM 
— gemma esteve (@gemaesteve) February 21, 2017 
It is believed that no one was injured in the shooting and the driver has been arrested. 
The driver’s motivations are currently unknown. 
Details of the shooting on a busy route into the city are being shared by local journalists through social media. 
On Twitter journalist Juan Antonio Tirado said: “A detainee for stealing a butane truck and driving against the Barcelona round.” 
Pictures from the scene show a stationary truck loaded with gas cylinders at the side of a road surrounded by police. 
More to follow.
